transcript:
my parents always bring up everything
they've spent on me since I was a kid
and I'm still hearing about how much
College cost okay it's like they keeping
score exactly so now I don't take
anything from them and I'm actually
scared to get help from anyone else I
feel like it'll be weaponized against me
like you're always questioning if
someone has an ulterior motive yeah it
seemed like my parents were really
generous and doing nice things for me
but the nice things always came with a
catch could that be why you feel like
you're being used a lot in your
friendships or that people aren't being
real with you
